cause.description:
When it came to defeating the Soviets, Ronald Reagan made it simple: "We win, they lose." Now more than ever, the defeatists in Congress must hear that same message. America will never surrender.
For more information, please visit www.wewintheylose.com.
1. Win the Global War on Terror
cause.mission: To tell our elected leaders that America will never surrender in the War on Terror
cause.name: We Win, They Lose
